name: KittyRun
description:
KittyRun is 2D endless runner platformer, wehere you can collect different power-ups and fight frenzy aliens. Try to cross as many platforms you can but keep in mind that game will get difficult as you progress.

At the end you can always check your progress and get in Leader Board if you are good enough.

We are still working on upgrades and making more interesting and fun to play. At the moment we are planning to implement more interesting characters, powerups and enemies. If you have any suggestion and ideas feel free to contact us.

http://petgames.freetzi.com
